programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: This biopic uses the format of a faux documentary to trace the rise and fall of figure skater Tonya Harding, whose career comes crashing down when her ex-husband orchestrates an attack on rival skater Nancy Kerrigan.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A college grad gets her first job as an assistant to a tempestuously toxic editrix at a fashion magazine. Meryl Streep gives a haute-couture-de-force performance as the boss from hell in this caustically hilarious adaptation.

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: In this explosive thriller, a team of mercenaries wage war on the CIA after they're double-crossed during a mission by rogue agent Max (Jason Patric). But in order to get to Max, the team will need a little help from sexy operative Aisha (Zoe Saldana), who has her own reasons for joining the fight.

programme.title: Anthropoid
programme.desc: Two Czechoslovakian soldiers parachute into Bohemia in 1942 on a dangerous mission to assassinate SS officer Reinhard Heydrich, leader of the Nazi forces controlling their country. This pulse-pounding historical thriller is based on true events.

programme.title: Skin
programme.desc: A former Neo-Nazi faces violence when he leaves his white supremacist gang.

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: A struggling artist is haunted by a beautiful woman that entranced him as a boy and continues to manipulate him in his adult life. Loosely based on the classic novel by Charles Dickens. Ethan Hawke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Chris Cooper. Alfonso Cuaron directed.

programme.title: Our Idiot Brother
programme.desc: In this gentle comedy, an upbeat and unfailingly honest organic farmer (Paul Rudd) turns to his sisters for help after his girlfriend leaves him, but soon after he moves in with each of them, he gets on their nerves with his naive ways. However, they eventually realize his optimism might actually be a strength.

programme.title: Frank
programme.desc: In this wicked smart black comedy, a musician joins up with an indie pop band led by a smart, charismatic musical genius named Frank. The only catch is that Frank never takes off his giant, sports-mascot-sized fake head.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
programme.desc: Bill and Ted's lyrics create a utopian future, so a tyrant sends evil robot versions of the simple-minded heroes back in time to kill them. Bill and Ted end up in the afterlife, and must outsmart the Grim Reaper in order to return to the land of the living to stop their evil counterparts and save their girlfriends.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling action remake, a group of U.S. high-school students wage a fierce guerrilla war against a hostile invading army in order to reclaim their freedom as occupying forces seize control of America.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, a mercenary reinvents himself as a wisecracking antihero called Deadpool after an experiment leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face. He then sets out to seek revenge on those responsible for his transformation.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: "28 Days Later" meets "The Road Warrior" and "Escape From New York" in this action-packed thriller about efforts to contain a deadly virus spreading across post-apocalyptic Great Britain. Rhona Mitra, Bob Hoskins, Adrian Lester, Alexander Siddig.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: In this sprawling epic about America, a young man in 1860s New York City seeks to avenge his father's death decades earlier at the hands of a hardened gang leader during a large skirmish between warring clans. He befriends the brutal crime lord, gaining his trust in order to get close enough to exact revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist moves into a house that was once the site of a multiple murder, and he soon encounters a deadly supernatural entity.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: After losing faith in Christmas, a young boy accidentally summons the malevolent holiday demon Krampus and his minions. The fearsome creatures proceed to wreak havoc on him and his dysfunctional family in this yuletide horror comedy based on ancient folklore.

programme.title: Here Comes the Devil
programme.desc: Two missing kids emerge from a cave, but their parents are horrified to realize they've brought an evil force with them in this mind-bending chiller.

programme.title: Splice
programme.desc: In this topical and terrifying horror film, genetic engineers Clive and Elsa create a highly intelligent female human-animal hybrid called Dren, which displays traits that signal she may be the next step in evolution. But Dren is about to make one final, shocking metamorphosis.

programme.title: Wes Craven Presents: Dracula 2000
programme.desc: The Count rises again in this eerie thriller. Christopher Plummer plays Van Helsing, an antique dealer with a secret vault. When thieves break into it, they open a coffin and find Dracula (Gerard Butler) ready for some bloody action. Jonny Lee Miller, Justine Waddell, Colleen Ann Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Esposito, Danny Masterson, Jeri Ryan, Lochlyn Munro, Sean Patrick Thomas.

programme.title: Dracula II: Ascension
programme.desc: The Prince of Darkness returns to wreak more havoc in this stylish chiller, a sequel to "Dracula 2000." The mighty Dracula (Stephen Billington) goes on a killing spree when his charred body is regenerated by a scientist (Craig Sheffer) and his students. A vampire-hunting priest (Jason Scott Lee) springs into action to end the mayhem. Roy Scheider, Jason London, Diane Neal.

programme.title: The Extra Man
programme.desc: In this charming urban comedy, lonely writer Louis Ives (Paul Dano) moves to New York City and befriends his eccentric landlord Henry Harrison (Kevin Kline), a celebrated playwright who moonlights as a male escort for high-society widows. Later, Louis attempts to strike up a relationship with an environmentally conscious coworker and realizes that he isn't the only one gaining something from his unusual friendship with Henry.

programme.title: Troll Hunter
programme.desc: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: Tom and Joan have been together for many years. Both are retired and are living peacefully in Belfast. One day, Joan feels a lump in her breast and before they know it, she is diagnosed with breast cancer. This sudden development takes a toll on the couple's seemingly happy marriage, opening up wounds that the two of them thought had healed a long time ago. In the middle of the chemotherapy cycle, they reconnect with Peter, their deceased daughter's former teacher.

programme.title: The Wrecking Crew
programme.desc: This intimate documentary profiles a group of L.A. session musicians known as "the Wrecking Crew," who backed a number of pop hits of the 1960s and '70s. These previously unsung heroes played on tracks from superstars such as Frank Sinatra, the Monkees and the Beach Boys.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, decide to throw one last party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going awry in this raunchy and ridiculous comedy.

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration in this hilarious buddy film.

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A comedic grand slam detailing a couple whose romance is threatened by an obsession with the Boston Red Sox.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In this fizzy, funny take on the classic screwball comedy, a lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart. However, soon after arriving he realizes she and her new boyfriend have just checked in.

programme.desc: Jeff was told that his girlfriend, Barbara, was cheating on him on numerous occasions by her daughter. Barbara says that her daughter is just a child that is making up things up. Jeff wants Karamo to unlock her phone and get to the truth. Next, Manny is convinced that his girlfriend, Bianca, is cheating and will sneak men into her their home after he falls asleep to hook up with.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show
programme.sub-title: HALLOWEEN HOUR; Reba McEntire; Rex Linn; Melissa McCarthy;Ben Falcone
programme.desc: Halloween Hour / Kellyoke: Banana Boat, Day-O / Reba McEntire and Rex Linn/ What's Creepin' Up On Me?/ Practical Peculiarities/ Kelly Extra: "Axe Marks the Spot" with Melissa McCarthy and Ben Falcone/ The Boulet Brothers: Dragula performs "All Hallows Eve"/ WIL: NICU Halloween Costumes.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie meets Big's ex---who proves to be everything Carrie feared she'd be. Meanwhile, the ladies find themselves drawn into strange, three-sided romances. Charlotte: Kristin Davis. Samantha: Kim Cattrall. Big: Chris Noth. Carrie: Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: While Mr. Big (Chris Noth) tells Carrie he will not marry, Samantha tries to bring "the Turtle" out of his shell and Miranda shows Charlotte that a "rabbit" can be a girl's best friend.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: At a baby shower for a friend, Carrie awaits the results of her home-pregnancy test, and Charlotte (Kristin Davis) wonders when she will move into the mother 'hood. Carrie: Sarah Jessica Parker. Samantha: Kim Cattrall. Big: Chris Noth. Miranda: Cynthia Nixon.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Samantha (Kim Cattrall) gives up sex, cold turkey; Carrie worries about her affair with Big when the two share a messy moment; and Charlotte's beau forgoes intimacy for mental security. Carrie: Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: After seeing Big (Chris Noth) at Mass, Carrie questions his faith in her; Miranda's new man ends up in hot water after every dirty deed; Sam has a big reaction to a small matter; and Charlotte gets a bad forecast about her happy future.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: Take Me Out to the Ballgame
programme.desc: A brokenhearted Carrie tries to get back in the dating game by pitching woo with the Yankees' new recruit (Mark Devine). Meanwhile, Samantha wrestles with her lover's minor-league lovemaking skills; and Miranda cries foul when the girls lose themselves in bad romances. Mr. Big: Chris Noth.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Honesty is the worst policy for Sam, who calls James (Jamie Goodwin) on his "problem," and Carrie, who tells a friend to leave her hubbie. Meanwhile, Miranda gets a crash course in dirty talk; and Charlotte finds the perfect mate. Or so she thinks. Stanford: Willie Garson.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Samantha (Kim Cattrall) has her hands full with a man who likes to be manhandled; meanwhile, Charlotte's guy lets her down; and Miranda wonders if anyone can make her happy. Harrison: Marc Kudish. Ben: Ian Kahn.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: They Shoot Single People, Don't They?
programme.desc: Charlotte forces herself into a romance after all her friends end up single at the same time. Kristin Davis, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: A friend's funeral prompts Carrie to resurrect her romance with Big (Chris Noth), and Miranda fears she might die after buying an apartment that induces panic attacks in her. Meanwhile, Sam is ostracized for going after a socialite's hubby, and Charlotte picks up a man at a cemetery. Josephina: Shannon Williams. Sandy: Felicity LaFortune. Dick: Michael DeVries.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The staffers hit the road in a rented bus when the building is deemed unsafe. Meanwhile, Nellie reaches out to Andy for help in adopting a baby, and Jim uses pie to spread cheer to Pam.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: It's Halloween in the office, and the trick's on Andy when his college music group arrives to perform, leading to a confrontation with his frenemy, Broccoli Rob (Stephen Colbert). Elsewhere, Dwight suspects a psycho is running rampant in the office, and Jim and Pam clash over Jim's new job.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Money problems plague Andy's family. Meanwhile, Dwight guests on a local radio show, so the staffers harass him with outrageous phone calls; and Kevin unearths a big secret about Oscar.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight faces his greatest professional shortcoming—selling to women. As a result, the lady staffers step up to give him advice so he can successfully sell to an important female client. Meanwhile, Angela suspects her paramour is cheating; Andy uses technology to connect with the others from his boat; and Toby tries to convince the men to grow mustaches.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Angela discovers the harsh truth about her husband's affair with Oscar, so she reaches out to Dwight for help. Meanwhile, Jim requests a favor from Stanley and Phyllis; Pam begins painting a mural in the warehouse; and Pete creates a tower made out of complaint cards.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: When the office holiday party fizzles, Dwight throws a traditional Schrute German Christmas. Meanwhile, Darryl suspects that Jim has forgotten to include him in a new job opportunity in Philadelphia, and Pete teaches Erin about the film "Die Hard."

programme.title: The Fight Life
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez prepares for a career-defining clash against reigning WBO junior welterweight world champion Josh Taylor. Following several subpar outings, including losing his lightweight crown to George Kambosos Jr., the Top Rank brass question if the mercurial Lopez still has what it takes. Once considered the future of boxing, Lopez has one last shot to prove he's still one of the sport's most sublime talents.

programme.title: The Fight Life
programme.desc: After losing his WBO belt to Teofimo Lopez, Josh Taylor must face the question: how many more chances will he have to fight at the top of the sport? Age and injury have begun to plague the former undisputed champion, but his path to recapturing his junior welterweight title starts with a rematch against past rival Jack Catterall. It's a fight that Top Rank executives make clear will dictate Taylor's future in the sport.

programme.title: The Fight Life
programme.desc: Seniesa "Super Bad" Estrada has dreamed of becoming the undisputed champion of the world, and she finally has her shot against fellow unified champion Yokasta Valle. Estrada is a trailblazer in women's boxing, but to become the first-ever undisputed minimumweight world champion, she must overcome injury and the mental pressure of settling a personal score against her former promoter, Oscar De La Hoya's Golden Boy Promotions.

programme.title: The Fight Life
programme.desc: Tyson Fury gears up for a showdown against Ukrainian Oleksandr Usyk to crown boxing's first undisputed heavyweight champion in 25 years. After a near-defeat to MMA star Francis Ngannou, "The Gypsy King" must prove he still sits atop the heavyweight throne. Go behind the scenes with the executives and matchmakers of Top Rank as they shape the business of boxing.

programme.title: The Fight Life
programme.desc: Many experts consider Naoya "Monster" Inoue to be the world's best pound-for-pound boxer, and to Top Rank executives who've been in the business for decades, one of the best fighters they've ever seen. But for many Western fans, the undefeated Japanese star is the greatest fighter you've never heard of. The undisputed junior featherweight champion can make a global statement when he faces Japanese boxing's most reviled figure, Luis Nery, in front of a sold-out crowd at the Tokyo Dome.

programme.desc: LSU (6-1, 3-0 SEC) at Texas A&M (6-1, 4-0). From Kyle Field. programme.title: Bobby
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez wrote, directed and costars in this powerful, behind-the-scenes look at the events leading up to the 1968 assassination of Sen. Robert F. Kennedy at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. The superb ensemble cast includes Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Fishburne, Harry Belafonte, Joy Bryant, Nick Cannon, Heather Graham, Helen Hunt, William H. Macy, Sharon Stone and others.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman and Djimon Hounsou star in Steven Spielberg's sweeping, vividly portrayed historical drama. Set in 1839, the tale follows African slaves who rebel against their captors before their ship reaches U.S. shores. The film also chronicles their recapture in America and the trial that followed. Matthew McConaughey, Nigel Hawthorne, David Paymer, Pete Postlethwaite, Stellan Skarsgard, Anna Paquin.

programme.title: Thief
programme.desc: A gifted professional safecracker accepts a deal with the Mafia in hopes that the score will allow him to finally retire and lead a normal life. He soon learns that powerful gangster Leo has no intention of letting him go.

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Saga of a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson, who basically plays himself.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative leads a quest into the dangerous African Congo in search of her presumed dead fiancé. Along for the ride is a primatologist, his assistant, a talking gorilla, a Romanian backer with his own agenda and a jungle-savvy mercenary. Based on the novel by Michael Crichton.

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their "Saturday Night Live" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: Erika Christensen and Scarlett Johansson star in this winning ensemble comedy reminiscent of "The Breakfast Club" and other teen flicks from the '80s. It's the story of six desperate teens who decide to steal SAT answers so they can ace the test and get into good colleges.

programme.title: She's All That
programme.desc: In this clever teen twist on "Pygmalion," Freddie Prinze Jr. stars as the most popular boy at a snooty L.A. high school, who bets his buddies that he can transform a nerdy girl (Rachael Leigh Cook) into the school prom queen. Matthew Lillard, Paul Walker, Jodi Lyn O'Keefe, Kevin Pollak, Kieran Culkin, Elden Ratliff, Anna Paquin.

programme.title: It Could Happen to You
programme.desc: A cop offers to share his lottery ticket with a waitress he can't afford to tip. He hits the jackpot and wins millions, but his girlfriend tries to convince him to welch on his promise to the waitress.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Frank Oz's remake of the 1975 thriller is a pointed black comedy with a sublime A-list cast. Nicole Kidman stars as a former TV exec who suspects something is amiss when all of her new neighbors seem programmed to please their husbands. Matthew Broderick costars as her Milquetoast husband. Bette Midler, Faith Hill, Glenn Close, Christopher Walken, Jon Lovitz.

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their "Saturday Night Live" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Clive Cussler's thrilling bestseller comes to life in this action-packed adventure. Matthew McConaughey stars as an intrepid explorer who helps a doctor (Penelope Cruz) contain a plague in Africa while searching for buried treasure. Breck Eisner directed. Steve Zahn, Lambert Wilson, Glynn Turman, Delroy Lindo, William H. Macy.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: Erika Christensen and Scarlett Johansson star in this winning ensemble comedy reminiscent of "The Breakfast Club" and other teen flicks from the '80s. It's the story of six desperate teens who decide to steal SAT answers so they can ace the test and get into good colleges.

Matthew Lillard, Paul Walker, Jodi Lyn O'Keefe, Kevin Pollak, Kieran Culkin, Elden Ratliff, Anna Paquin.

programme.title: Varsity Blues
programme.desc: In this rousing coming-of-age tale, a second-string high-school quarterback (James Van Der Beek) replaces the injured starter. At first, the quarterback revels in his new role, but then, his relaxed attitude causes problems with his gung-ho coach (Jon Voight). Paul Walker, Rob Lester, Scott Caan, Richard Lineback, Ali Larter, Tiffany C. Love.

programme.title: Barbarella
programme.desc: A galactic sex kitten goes on a quest to rescue a lost Earth scientist from strange adversaries.

programme.title: Factory Girl
programme.desc: Sienna Miller's bravura turn as wildly popular socialite and 1960s counterculture icon Edie Sedgwick (1943-71) puts the juice in this astounding sex-drugs-and-rock-and-roll biopic. Guy Pearce is equally compelling as Sedgwick's mentor, Andy Warhol, and Hayden Christensen stands out as a Bob Dylan-esque folk rocker with whom she falls in love. Directed by George Hickenlooper from a screenplay by Captain Mauzner. Jimmy Fallon, Beth Grant, Mena Suvari, Tara Summers, James Naughton.

programme.title: In the Cut
programme.desc: Meg Ryan kisses her "good girl" screen image goodbye in this sexually charged thriller. She plays a teacher who begins a passionate affair with a New York City detective (Mark Ruffalo) who's investigating a vicious serial killer. Jane Campion directed and co-wrote the script with Susanna Moore, the author of the 1995 novel "In the Cut." Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: In this offbeat, touching comedy-drama, a troubled teen convinces her new maid that her estranged father is in love with the caretaker. When the seemingly simple-minded woman moves to be with the drug-addicted man, their lives change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Young Adult
programme.desc: An author bonds with a former high-school classmate when she returns to her hometown in hopes of reliving her glory days.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: Aaron attempts to bury his recently deceased father while dealing with his eccentric family and a number of newly exposed family secrets, including his dad's relationship with a blackmailing dwarf in this uproarious comedy.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Terminally uncool club-hopping brothers Doug and Steve Butabi---first seen strutting their head-bobbing stuff on "Saturday Night Live"---struggle to make it through the doors of the elite Roxbury Club and hobnob with "hotties." Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: In this breezy romantic comedy, the exasperated parents of a 35-year-old ladies' man who won't move out of the house hire a woman who specializes in convincing men to leave the nest.

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Snoop Dogg and Dr. Dre star in this crudely amusing comedy. They play car-wash workers who---between smoking and selling pot and flirting with women---somehow manage to wash a few cars, but their world is turned upside down when the owner is kidnapped. D.J. Pooh, George Wallace, Angell Conwell, Shawn Fonteno.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow

programme.desc: An ambitious nightclub promoter discovers that the woman he tried so hard to get is even harder to get rid of when their casual romance turns deadly serious. programme.desc: John Henson pairs up the bakers into research teams, and they cobble together lab specimen-stuffed desserts. With elimination looming, the bakers serve judges Carla Hall, Zac Young and Stephanie Boswell a mad menagerie of cutesy-to-creepy desserts.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits several family-owned restaurants. Included: A husband and wife in Nashville run a gourmet food truck specializing in grilled cheese; and a nearby Italian spot serves grandma's recipes for lasagna and lamb shanks. Also: Siblings in Kansas City embrace their Chinese heritage by making firebird chicken and chili pepper wontons.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is taking some delightful travels down memory lane, beginning with an ancient schoolhouse in Ohio that offers a comfort food curriculum. Then there's a former church in Redmond, Oregon, that serves divine pizza and a throwback restaurant in Stamford, Connecticut, that serves diner classics.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy orders a short-rib burger and savory apple strudel at a throwback bar in Denver; in Tempe, Ariz., he visits a Pakistani restaurant and tries a goat recipe, as well as tandoori chicken; and finally, in Philadelphia, chicken pie and grilled octopus are eaten.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits a Syracuse restaurant known for its tomato dipping sauce, and he also samples duck-and-cheese pizza. Later, a trip to Nags Head, N.C., includes deep-fried pickles and soft-shell crab.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy explores San Francisco's culinary offerings, beginning with spicy shrimp and gravy and braised beef short ribs. Also: A New York-style deli serves potato latkes and old-fashioned chicken noodle with matzo ball soup; and a food truck delivers a unique take on Asian fusion.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy puts chicken in the spotlight. Included: a Baltimore landmark known for its wings and steak wrap; a soul food joint in Eugene, Ore., that serves a barbecue bird and signature burger; and a Southern spot in Des Moines, Iowa, with fried chicken and red-velvet waffles.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieri's finding a desert treasure and island flavor. In Palm Desert, Cal., a breakfast-lunch cafe dishin' out a righteous rib melt and nostalgic breakfast tarts. In Maui, Hawaii, a funky gluten-free spot making full-flavored pizza and fish and chips. And in Virginia Beach, Va., a crazy Caribbean joint serving up jammin' jerk pork and mama's beef stew.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is grabbing global grub. In Houston, there's a Jamaican joint knocking it out of the park with their oxtail and curry goat. Plus, Guy checks out a Lebanese stop serving up mom's specialties like kibbie balls and kabobs. Then, in Cancun, Mexico, he stops at a 24-hour hot spot cranking out the bomb burritos.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's firing up an entire world of barbecue on this trip. In Wilmington, Delaware, a righteous spot smokin' up chicken salad and off-the-chain chili. In San Diego, a real-deal joint doing their 'cue with Argentinian flavor.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is embracing family-run spots. In Ottawa, Canada, two brothers-in-law carry on a decades-long seafood tradition. In Richmond, Va., a mother-son duo runs a breakfast, lunch, and dinner joint in honor of their Pop.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieri is diving into the bomb beef and barbecue. In Orlando, Florida, there's an authentic Vietnamese spot serving phenomenal pho and a beefy specialty, where Guy is joined by Justin Warner. In Palm Springs, California, Guy visits a not-your-typical burger joint dishing out their "Buddha Burger" and "Devil's Revenge." And in Temecula, California, he hits up a smoking barbecue stop where they're even putting their 'cue into lasagna.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Green chili and mile-high burgers are found in Fort Collins, Colo. Also: Guy visits a breakfast-lunch café in Falmouth, Mass., known for its pickle chips and savory scone sandwich; and travels to a family-owned restaurant for soft-shell crab and kale soup.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieri is caught up in a whirlwind of flavors. In Norfolk, Va., he stops at a two-for-one spot where a bomb butcher stacks sandwiches by day and a chef firing up ramen and sticky wings takes over at night. Then, there is a German-Swiss joint smack in the middle of Maui, Hawaii, serving rouladen and old-fashioned apple strudel.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives
programme.desc: Guy dives into hearty helpings of comfort starting with an Atlanta soul food spot dishing out Southern seafood and killer fried chicken.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia.

There's just one problem: Bobby must hide his new role on the team from his neurotic mom (Kathy Bates). Henry Winkler, Fairuza Balk.

programme.title: The Duke
programme.desc: In 1961, a 60 year old taxi driver stole Goya's portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London. It was the first (and remains the only) theft in the Gallery's history. What happened next became the stuff of legend.

programme.title: The King's Man

The story follows and unfolds the origins of the Kingsman, the independent intelligence agency.

How, Peter wonders, did Death get the form? "It was e-mailed to me by your HMO." But Death must take a forced holiday when he sprains his ankle chasing Peter, who has no desire to go gently into that good night. In addition to Peter, series creator Seth MacFarlane lends his voice to Dr. Jack Kevorkian, Freddy Krueger, Hitler and other characters.

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Death (voice of Adam Carolla) transports Peter back to 1984 for a night. When he returns, he's married to Molly Ringwald and Lois is married to Quagmire. And that's not all that's different.

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Hank Azaria.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

Guest voices: Dr. Phil McGraw; Richard Lewis; Fran Drescher.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In three haunting tales, Bart and Milhouse discover the joys of board games, Lisa falls for a vampire (voice of Daniel Radcliffe) and Marge and Homer's romantic second honeymoon at sea is interrupted by a castaway (voice of Hugh Laurie).

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: "Treehouse of Horror XXII": Homer gets his arm caught in a boulder in an isolated canyon. He's also paralyzed, but can communicate via natural gases. Mountain climber Aron Ralston provides his own voice. Meanwhile, Bart and Milhouse are in deep space, transformed into one-eyed avatars and caught up in planetary warfare after Bart falls in love. And Ned Flanders is transformed nightly into a cold-blooded vigilante.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

In "Dead and Shoulders," Bart is decapitated in a kite mishap and his head is placed on Lisa's body, necessitating that the two learn to act as one. With "Freaks No Geeks," it's the 1930s and Marge is a trapeze artist and Homer's the strongman in a traveling circus, where sideshow freak Moe puts the moves on Marge.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In a Halloween-theme episode Bart reads Aramaic symbols from the bottom of his desk and he and Lisa are transported to an alternate world filled with demons. In a homage to "The Others," the Simpsons reconnect with their earlier incarnations from the Tracey Ullman era.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Golf Films
programme.desc: Chronicling the extraordinary life of six-time major champion Lee Trevino, exploring his journey from humble beginnings to international stardom. Trevino's story is not just about his prowess on the golf course but also about his resilience in the face of adversity and tragedy, his drive to succeed, and his ability to inspire others through his passion and dedication. Interviews include Jack Nicklaus, George Lopez and President George W. Bush.

programme.desc: Second-round play in the $1 million Aramco Team Series season finale in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The team competition concludes after this round, with teams comprised of three pros and one amateur.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Golf

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date. Stars Robert Buckley, Amy Groening.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi heads to the Heidelberg Christmas market to sell her hand-painted ornaments. While there, she falls for a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Christmas with the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: Joel poses as Brooke's former boyfriend when she goes home for the holidays. Joel is Jewish, so Brooke's family celebrates Christmas and Hanukkah in this very merry ruse.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman returns to her hometown over the holidays to help her mother pack up her home yet unexpectedly reconnects with a past lover.

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Christmas!
programme.desc: A holiday movie production comes to town in need of a costume designer. Kerry, a local shop owner, steps into the role and crosses paths with the film's charming star Brad.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind schoolteacher finds romance when a student and her optometrist mom help him see Christmas in color for the very first time.

programme.title: Ghosts of Christmas Always
programme.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.

programme.title: Christmas at Castle Hart
programme.desc: An American woman in Ireland in search of her Irish roots meets an Earl and is mistakenly hired to host his castle's epic Christmas party.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A Rhode Island community comes together to create special Halloween and Christmas moments several weeks early for an 8-year-old girl with a life-threatening illness.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: A resort executive is sent to transform a quaint lodge into an updated resort, but the lodge's holiday charm and the owner's dashing son win her over, tempting her to reconsider the modernization plans.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend Anderson unexpectedly reunite in a familiar looking town full of Christmas spirit that restores its visitors during their times of deep turmoil.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter in a blizzard, she learns that they are the Royal Family of Galwick. Anna shows the Prince how they do Christmas in her hometown of Kentsbury.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: A travel writer, a tech entrepreneur, a devoted mother and more strangers are stranded at the airport for the holidays, they rent a van for an unexpected road trip.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Claus
programme.desc: On the verge of her big break, aspiring news anchor Avery Quinn catches a home intruder wearing a red suit claiming to be Santaâ€s son, Chris.

programme.title: A Holiday Spectacular
programme.desc: Set in 1958, follows Maggie who sneaks up to New York City to make her secret dream come true: dancing live on stage in the Christmas Spectacular at Radio City Music Hall, putting her high-society wedding plans on hold.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: Undercover Holiday
programme.desc: When returning home for the holidays, newly minted pop star Jaylen tells her protective family that her overzealous security guard Matt is, in fact, her new beau.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to be Merry
programme.desc: Looking for a fresh angle to her book on relationships, Merry heads to snow covered Vermont. She finds a new perspective and Christmas cheer with charismatic aid worker Adam.

programme.title: Christmas with a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: Dealing with her grandma's death, JJ seeks dissertation inspiration. Henrik, drawn to her troll figurine, invites her to Bergen, Norway, to trace its origins.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for "Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure" will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create The Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Scouting For Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball. Starring Tamera Mowry-Housley and Carlo Marks.

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Charismatic Katie Griggs, who takes on the name Guru Jagat, espouses the teachings of Yogi Bhajan, a mysterious Punjabi Sikh who brought his version of Kundalini yoga to the United States in 1969. Former followers of Yogi Bhajan discuss the social conditions of the '60s and '70s that led to the rise of anti-establishment spirituality and the growth of Yogi Bhajan's following.

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends' carefully curated exteriors.

programme.title: Midsommar
programme.desc: Just as their relationship is on the brink of falling apart, couple Dani and Christian are brought closer by a family tragedy. The mourning Dani then joins Christian and his friends, Josh and Mark, on a trip to a rural Swedish village that is celebrating a once-in-a-blue-moon festival. As the tourists partake in the celebrations, they discover that the idyllic community holds many unnerving secrets, and it all unfolds in broad daylight.

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
programme.desc: A teenage boy ingratiates himself with the family of a cardiovascular surgeon. Gradually, he begins to reveal his dark intentions, causing the surgeon's life to spin out of control in this unnerving psychological thriller.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: When aliens invade a poor neighborhood in London in this thrilling sci-fi romp, a group of rowdy teens decide to fight back and defend their home turf, while a woman (Jodie Whittaker) whom they mugged inadvertently gets caught up in their struggle.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A documentary team heads for the Brazilian jungle to search for a remote native tribe, but ends up fleeing from a giant snake.

programme.title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
programme.desc: After she begins to operate independently from the Joker, Harley Quinn teams up with Black Canary, Helena Bertinelli, and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from a contract killing that has been initiated by Black Mask, a brutal and narcissistic Gotham City crime lord.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: This horror-mystery film follows awkward teen Owen who, in the 1990s, becomes a big fan of a monster-driven horror television show called The Pink Opaque. In school, he encounters another awkward teen, Maddy, who also likes the show. The two form a bond by watching the show. But when the show is canceled, their interaction also dwindles. Reconnecting again in their twenties, they revisit their fandom of the show as their reality also starts shifting mysteriously.

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Yogi Bhajan's backstory and the invention of his mystical persona who preached a healthy, drug-free lifestyle, enlightenment, and equality is scrutinized. Former followers recount the rigor of his teachings including physical hardships, unusual rules, and abuse. By 2007, Kundalini yoga hits the mainstream and years later Katie Griggs opens the RA MA Institute in Los Angeles, claiming direct links to Yogi Bhajan.

programme.title: Seth Meyers: Dad Man Walking
programme.desc: ​Emmy-winning writer, New York Times bestselling author, and SNL alum Seth Meyers stars in his first HBO stand-up special. Known for his dry wit and sharp topical commentary as host of Late Night with Seth Meyers, the comedian shifts his focus to his personal life – from the chaos of raising three young kids, to navigating different communication styles in marriage, and more.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. Soon, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise, in this nerve-shredding horror film.

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Nearly three decades after their initial run-in with the unsettling Pennywise, the members of the Losers Club' have left their hometown, pursuing lives of their own. However, some unnerving news delivered over the phone sends each of them running back to the source of their original fright.

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Yogi Bhajan's backstory and the invention of his mystical persona who preached a healthy, drug-free lifestyle, enlightenment, and equality is scrutinized. Former followers recount the rigor of his teachings including physical hardships, unusual rules, and abuse. By 2007, Kundalini yoga hits the mainstream and years later Katie Griggs opens the RA MA Institute in Los Angeles, claiming direct links to Yogi Bhajan.

programme.title: It's Florida, Man
programme.desc: A quirky adventure unfolds as strange events and wild antics take over in Florida. Expect unexpected mishaps and lots of humor in this entertaining journey.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Wes Craven directed this clever spoof of '80s slasher films about a hooded killer who works his way through a California town, slowly stalking a teen (Neve Campbell) who's traumatized by the recent grisly murder of her mother. Courteney Cox costars as a local reporter, who believes that the killer is still on the loose. Drew Barrymore, Skeet Ulrich, David Arquette, Matthew Lillard, Jamie Kennedy, Henry Winkler.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Director Wes Craven and screenwriter Kevin Williamson reunited for this sequel, another sly spoof of the slasher genre. This time, Gale Weathers' account of the grisly killings in the first film has been made into a movie, which inspires more murders and mayhem. Courteney Cox, Neve Campbell, David Arquette, Jamie Kennedy, Jerry O'Connell, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Laurie Metcalf.

programme.title: Scream 3

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: Upon hearing the news that a huge comet will hit Earth within 48 hours and start the dreaded apocalypse, John Garrity, his estranged wife Allison, and their son Nathan decide to make their way to Greenland, where a group of bunkers is located. The journey, however, proves to be more perilous than they anticipated. Amidst the growing panic and lawlessness around them, the family tries their hardest to catch the last flight to the last possible safe haven on the planet.

programme.title: The Penguin

When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home.

Soon, their fame turns into a curse when deadly tragedy strikes the Von Erich family.

programme.desc: A dead man returns to haunt his wife in this moving drama, manifesting as a ghost wearing a sheet with eyeholes over his head. He remains stuck in the house even after she moves out, and observes its various occupants over the course of several decades. At the same time, he tries to communicate with a ghost living in the house next door.

programme.title: Dune

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: All over the world, there are places and objects that are thought to be cursed. Many people avoid these locations and things, believing they will bring harm. Others think that curses are nothing than superstition and folklore. Are curses just the product of over-active imaginations? The byproduct of uncanny coincidences? Or is it possible that these curses are real-and there are dark forces at play that defy explanation?

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: There are some events that are so destructive, so astounding, or truly miraculous-that for the faithful-they must be directed by the hand of the Almighty. The Great Flood. The Plagues of Egypt. Sodom and Gomorrah. Moses Parting the Red Sea. Were these merely tall tales, or could they be historically accurate? And, if so, were they just freak occurrences-or were Acts of God? That is what will try and find out.

programme.title: The UnXplained

In China, a vast necropolis was constructed as a way to connect to the afterlife. Is there an inherit need for us to dig up our past? What is it that we are searching for? And what profound secrets might remain hidden in tombs? That is what we will try to find out.

programme.title: Building off the Grid
programme.desc: A couple looks to bring the shores of Key West to their donkey sanctuary in Missouri; despite having experience with building off-grid properties, they face challenges as they attempt to construct a double container home deep in the woods.

programme.title: Building off the Grid

programme.desc: Mike, Robert, and the Black Dog Salvage guys disassemble a 40-foot Eiffel Tower replica in Columbus, OH. While in Columbus, they pick through a fellow salvager's collection. Grayson builds a floor lamp back at the warehouse.

programme.title: BBQ High
programme.desc: After a disappointing result at State last year, Marc begins his BBQ season working on his ribs recipe. Meanwhile, Zane, the ribs champion, starts his year off on the wrong foot, jeopardizing his chances of victory.

programme.title: BBQ High
programme.desc: Marc and Zane battle to win the top prize in ribs to qualify for the BBQ State Championship. Meanwhile, small-town student Emery hustles at practice as her future hinges on perfecting her chicken skin to win scholarships.

programme.title: BBQ High
programme.desc: After qualifying for State, Zane's team struggles to stay engaged at their next competition and his coaches find creative ways to teach them. Meanwhile, an overly large chicken may cost Emery her future and a chance to go to her dream college.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Michael and Ashley begin construction on their 1912 inn, focusing on the exterior to ensure it is waterproof and restored to its former beauty. The renovations include fresh paint, a custom front door, and a copper-clad awning.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Michael and Ashley make a distinct first impression by restoring the foyer. In the corridor, old newspapers form a chronology of the inn, and historic post office boxes are installed. As visitors check-in, they may open the box doors to locate their keys behind them.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Michael and Ashley find balance in working on vintage restoration and custom carpentry.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Attention turns to the entrance, lounge and bar area at the inn. Here, guests will find cozy vintage touches and custom elements, including upholstered benches, a leathered marble bar, and new cabinetry with the original doors found at the inn.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Michael and Ashley work on the outside of the inn and adding an oasis with cabanas and a pool using a century old brick.

programme.title: Restoring Galveston: The Inn
programme.desc: Finishing touches go all around the inn as they count down to opening day. It's a race to finish the last suite, set up the boutique with their custom modular shelving, and add the vintage metal fire pit Ashley welded herself.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: A woman and her grandmother hunt for a beach home on Anna Maria Island, Fla.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Newlyweds renovate a beachside bargain near the Greater Atlantic City area. Their plans include removing some walls and adding to their outdoor space. But first, they have to get zoning approval.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.sub-title: Bring It On in Brigantine, NJ
programme.desc: A couple is ready to buy a vacation home in Brigantine, New Jersey, for their family of four. However, the house is in need of significant renovations and contain unforeseen construction issues.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: A family get a vacation spot of their own near relatives in Galveston, Texas.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley awakens 57 years later in this sequel to 1979's "Alien," returning to the space colony where she first encountered a hideous, reptilian creature. The film won Oscars for Sound and Visual Effects.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: A CIA analyst uncovers a nefarious Russian conspiracy to destroy the U.S. economy, and races to protect his wife while working with his mentor to prevent a catastrophic terrorist attack in this explosive action thriller.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In this fizzy, funny take on the classic screwball comedy, a lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart. However, soon after arriving he realizes she and her new boyfriend have just checked in.

programme.title: Viva
programme.desc: A former boxer physically confronts his estranged son, a makeup artist-turned-drag performer, in this searing drama. In the aftermath of the assault, both men are forced to rectify old wounds.

programme.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
programme.desc: Two female students are haunted by devilish forces while stranded at their Catholic prep school over winter break. Meanwhile, a mysterious hospital escapee charts a course toward the school, and ends up getting a ride from a grieving, middle-aged couple.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Ki-taek and his family struggle with unemployment. Their polar opposites, the Park family, lead a life of luxury and wealth. Ki-taek's family grows more fascinated with the Parks each day until they find themselves in the thick of something unexpected.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: Tom Clancy's thriller about a Soviet commander heading for the U.S. coast in a missile-laden supersub, hoping to defect. But the CIA, aware that the vessel was about to embark on an evasive mission to demonstrate its ability to avoid detection, believes that the commander is insane, and that he plans to start World War III.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: An imminent stepmother begins to bond with her fiancé's two hostile children, but their hard-won amicability soon becomes threatened when the traumatic memories of her oppressively religious childhood are reactivated after a snowstorm confines all of them to a cabin in a remote holiday village.

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: After receiving a call claiming he has only 88 minutes to live, a forensic psychiatrist and college professor races against time to stay alive and find the caller. Al Pacino stars in this involving mystery thriller filled with twists and turns. Alicia Witt, Leelee Sobieski, Amy Brenneman, William Forsythe, Deborah Kara Unger. Directed by Jon Avnet.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: A professional enforcer probes the robbery of a mob poker game by three low-level thieves, but his investigation is complicated by an alcoholic hit man, incompetent gangsters and the playboy host of the game.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this hilarious, offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled PI probes a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Along the way, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In this crime drama set during the Great Depression, three rebellious brothers get into the bootlegging business and battle treachery on both sides of the law as they expand their operation into the big city.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: A married couple become convinced their house is haunted and set up cameras to capture the malevolent entities on video in this relentlessly terrifying tale of the supernatural.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror sequel, a family come under attack by supernatural forces.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror sequel, a family come under attack by supernatural forces.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3
programme.desc: The origins of the haunting that shocked the world are revealed in this prequel from "Catfish" directors Henry Joost and Ariel Schulman.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4
programme.desc: The fourth entry in the series focuses on a teenage girl whose family allow a young boy in their neighborhood to stay with them while his mom is sick. Soon, eerie things start happening in the house and the girl starts to investigate.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 5: The Marked Ones
programme.desc: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy (Ron Perlman), the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. Writer-director Guillermo del Toro's sequel improves on his original, showcasing wickedly elegant monsters and spectacular action sequences.

programme.title: Slice
programme.desc: Sean is a pizza delivery boy who is killed while on a routine delivery. The investigation goes haywire and people start hunting for drug dealers, werewolves, and ghosts. When things get supernatural, a terrible secret is let loose. Sean's pizza place is a gateway to Hell.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: In this outrageous action spectacle, a disgraced border-town sheriff pulls out the heavy artillery in order to capture a drug kingpin who's on his way to Mexico after escaping from an FBI convoy.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: In this uproarious comedy, a disappointing trip takes a turn for the better when one of the vacationers (Selena Gomez) is mistaken for a British heiress and whisked away to glamorous Monte Carlo with her friends (Katie Cassidy, Leighton Meester) in tow.

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: This warmhearted dramedy centers on Ryan Bingham, who works for a company that specializes in firing people. Ryan is soon forced to take a newcomer along on a business trip in order to show her firsthand what he does, and he begins to reflect on his lonely life and develops a relationship with fellow frequent flyer Alex Goran.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: This quirky thriller follows Mark Whitacre, who discovers that his company is involved in price-fixing and turns informant for the FBI. Convinced he'll be a hero, he wears a wire to gather the evidence needed to convict his bosses. Unfortunately, both the case and Whitacre's integrity are compromised when FBI agents discover that he isn't the saintly figure he made himself out to be.

programme.title: The Sea of Trees
programme.desc: A depressed American businessman makes a pilgrimage to Aokigahara, Japan's notorious "Sucide Forest," with intentions to kill himself. But a chance encounter with a badly injured Japanese man awakens the desire to live within both of them. As they partner together to struggle their way out of the dense forest, they slowly open up about the traumas that brought them there.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: A group of English women find themselves without their husbands as they leave to serve in Afghanistan. In response, they band together to form a choir on a military base. Their group then attracts massive media attention, igniting what begins to develop into a global movement.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: A down-and-out alcoholic screenwriter decides to commit suicide by going on a final bender in Sin City. During his self-destructive final days, he falls in love with a prostitute.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: In this arresting drama, an ambitious young doctor who's eager to impress his colleagues treats an 18-year-old patient with a kidney infection. Before long, his enthusiasm becomes something closer to an obsession.

programme.desc: Pride is cut off from the team and backed into a corner after the investigation into Eddie Barrett uncovers a malicious plot.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team is concerned when Sebastian becomes unreachable while undercover as a new recruit.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team must track down a mysterious female assassin responsible for murders in Athens, Rome and London. Also, Wade's son begs her to allow him to go on a police ride-along for an article he's writing on a youth outreach program at the NOPD.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a journalist is murdered, the team uncovers information linking the suspect to past cases. The victim's death also strikes a chord with Maggie, leaving her desperate for answers in regard to a traumatic event in her personal life.

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: OA and Maggie team up with members of the FBI's Fugitives Department to track down a person wanted for murder who is also on America's top 10 most wanted list.

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: A controversial senior leader from Egypt comes to New York for a heart transplant, and OA struggles to balance his personal opinion with his professional duty when he is assigned to the security detail.

programme.title: ER

programme.desc: Carter comes to the rescue when the stalled search for Abby's brother---and the arrival of her mother (Sally Field)---pushes the nurse to her limit. Meanwhile, Kovac comes back to work just in time to save an overdose case from frying his own brain; and Pratt digs himself into a deeper hole with Chen (Ming-Na) during his stint with the EMTs. Pratt: Mekhi Phifer. Lopez: Lisa Vidal. Lewis: Sherry Stringfield.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Three persons are murdered during a holdup at Doc Magoo's, and Chen's partial description of one of the perps leads to an unpleasant morning for Pratt and Gallant (Mekhi Phifer, Sharif Atkins); Lewis befriends a teenage cancer patient (Patrick Fugit), despite his mother's disapproval; and Carter decides to propose to Abby, who's having difficulty finding someone to give her mother (Sally Field) a ride to the bus station for her trip back to Wisconsin. Lewis: Sherry Stringfield.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: A favor for a popular but closeted politician (Bruce Weitz) has dire results for Kerry---and a patient; Carter and Abby come to terms with their ailing romance; Kovac finds an unusual outlet for his inner demons; and Romano's days as Chief of Staff begin to wane. Kerry: Laura Innes. Abby: Maura Tierney. Lewis: Sherry Stringfield. Chen: Ming-Na.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Heads roll and hearts break after Romano is demoted to the ER, where a mom-to-be hears grim news about her own health; Pratt's faux pas spoils Chen's birthday; and Luka implores Kerry and Corday to help him arrange a pro-bono operation for a dying Croatian child. Meanwhile, a patient's broken wrist leads to tragic complications---and a change of perspective for a County newlywed. Lewis: Sherry Stringfield. Pratt: Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Weaver treats a lethargic 6-week-old baby; Lewis works with a mentally ill man who took too much of his anti-psychotic medication; and a Croatian physician observes surgery on a young boy with a congenital heart problem.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Carter makes a dramatic decision after Abby's brother (Tom Everett Scott) causes a stir at the funeral for Carter's grandmother; Kovac breaks every rule in the book to save a dying Croatian boy who's been smuggled into the country for treatment; Lewis waffles on whether she wants to end things with her "husband" (Donal Logue); and Romano reaches the end of the rope concerning his injured arm. Jack: Michael Gross. Abby: Maura Tierney.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU travels to Chicago to investigate an unsub who leaves red roses on each victim. Also, Rossi gets an unexpected visit from his ex-wife, Krystall Richards.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU is called to Taos, N.M. to investigate an UnSub who is targeting his victims' temporal lobes.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When Reid discovers former FBI Special Agent Owen Quinn locked inside a storage unit, the BAU questions the credibility of Quinn's bizarre accounts of searching for an UnSub that he named "The Strangler".

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Packages with gruesome contents are delivered to six people in the Washington, D.C., area, and the BAU must first figure out what connects the recipients before they can identify the UnSub. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.sub-title: The Man In The Red Suit

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: In the Season 2 premiere, a bomb detonates at a restaurant in Queens, and the case becomes personal for OA, who grew up eating there. But what initially seems like a terrorist attack reveals itself to be more complex, and OA goes undercover to prevent another incident.

programme.desc: Operation Gunnersid, a 1943 attack on the Norsk Hydro Plant in Norway by six Norwegian commandos, is recalled. The plant was being used to produce heavy water, a needed ingredient for nuclear weapons; and the mission was to take the plant offline.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: Air Warriors: Hellcat is the story of the reliable and resilient carrier-based fighter plane that helped secure victory for the U.S. in the South Pacific during World War II.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: Celebrating the world's top close air support aircraft, which enter battles at a minute's notice to protect American and British ground troops.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: Inside stories of the most iconic military aircraft of the last 60 plus years.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: History's most terrifying air disasters, and the investigations that followed, are revisited and reexamined.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out on a plane, an emergency situation can escalate to a deadly disaster in seconds.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: On Sept. 28, 1992, a Pakistani airliner crashes in the Himalayas while on approach to the airport. Investigators determine the cause of the air disaster that doomed everyone on board Flight 268.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: When a tree-strike takes out both engines of an MD-83, the crew must find a way to land a 60-ton plane with no power.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Indonesian investigators must determine why a Boeing 737 Max 8—one of the world's best-selling new airplanes—plunged into the Java Sea.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: A Boeing 737 is rocked by a midair explosion that challenges its pilots and nearly ejects a passenger out of a blown-out window.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Authorities investigate if the 737 crash on a Carribean island is really caused by the weather or something else.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: A mid-flight bombing aboard Philippine Airlines Flight 434 forces its pilots to attempt a daring landing at Naha Airport in Okinawa, Japan.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: An Airbus A321 carrying Russian tourists back from Egypt in 2015 suddenly disappears from radar minutes after takeoff. Air Force jets locate the charred wreckage in the Sinai Desert. There are no survivors. How did this modern airplane just fall from the sky? Follow Egyptian investigators and their Russian counterparts as they work through political tensions and wild rumors to discover the truth behind the crash of Metrojet Flight 9268.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Qantas Airways Flight 72 cruises at 37,000 feet to Perth, Australia from Singapore. Suddenly, the highly automated A-330 fires off a series of contradictory warnings and repeatedly nosedives toward the Indian Ocean. Thanks to the heroic flying of a former fighter pilot, the accident does not end in all-out disaster, but the danger is far from over. With almost 600 A-330s in service around the globe, investigators must find out what went wrong before calamity strikes again.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: A DC-9 lines up for a nighttime landing at Zurich's Kloten Airport. Although the pilots can't see the runway, their navigation instruments indicate the plane is locked onto the proper signal from the airport. But the equipment is wrong. The plane is actually flying more than a thousand feet lower than it should. Discover the series of errors that caused Alitalia Flight 404 to plow into the ground six miles short of its destination.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: An examination of the 2010 crash of Ethiopian Airlines Flight 409 following its takeoff from Beirut-Rafic Hariri International Airport in Beirut. The accident was blamed on human error, but rumors persist that it was the result of terrorism.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: Inside stories of the most iconic military aircraft of the last 60+ years.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: The V-22 Osprey is spotlighted.

programme.title: Air Warriors
programme.desc: The Season 2 premiere spotlights the A-10 Thunderbolt II, which is often called "Warthog" due to its clunky appearance.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: The 2005 crash of TANS Peru Flight 204 in the Amazon jungle is investigated.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Following three deadly crashes, investigators uncover dangerous mathematical flaws in the very operations systems designed to prevent aircraft from flying into mountains.

programme.title: The Girl With All the Gifts
programme.desc: In this engaging horror thriller set in a world overrun by zombies, a trio of soldiers, a teacher and a scientist are forced to protect a young girl whose immunity to the outbreak could be the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie races to Wilmington to rescue Claire from the gallows, only to learn that the American Revolution has reached North Carolina.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Claire makes a startling discovery about Brianna and Roger's newborn daughter.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin, a young girl and her two fathers are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand that the family make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. With limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: While on holiday, a young couple's car suddenly breaks down in an insular rural community, so they take refuge in a remote cabin awaiting repairs. Yet when a trio of masked strangers begins lurking outside the cabin, the couple quickly realizes that not all is as it seems in this town.

programme.title: Camp Pleasant Lake
programme.desc: An old, abandoned camp is revitalized when its unsettling history gains some interest. Now, the camp will invite some lucky guests to relive the disturbing events that once took place there, but what starts out as a harmless horror retreat turns real very quickly.

programme.title: Navy Seals V Demons
programme.desc: Deep in the Bible Belt, Navy Seals go undercover to save a town from the Demons from Hell who are stealing souls.

programme.title: Dear David
programme.desc: Based on a viral Twitter thread, the horror film follows a comic artist named Adam. After fighting with Internet trolls, Adam becomes anxious and experiences sleep paralysis. He documents his scary symptoms on Twitter. Soon, he suspects a child's dead ghost is the reason behind his suffering.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: This adaptation of Stephen King's novel is about Andy, a loving father who's guiding his daughter Charlie to control and subdue her psychic ability known as pyrokinesis, wherein she can start fires through her mind. But this power is also a liability as her family continues to hide and evade government forces bent on capturing and examining Charlie and her abilities.

programme.title: Imaginary
programme.desc: This supernatural horror film follows Jessica, a woman who returns to live in her childhood house with her husband and stepdaughter Alice. The girl finds Jessica's childhood teddy bear named Chauncey, and she encourages the child to treat Chauncey as an imaginary friend. However, when sinister things start happening as Alice also behaves badly, Jessica suspects there's more than meets the eye with Chauncey.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: A brilliant toy company roboticist uses artificial intelligence to develop M3GAN, a life-like doll programmed to emotionally bond with her newly orphaned niece. But when the doll's programming works too well, she becomes overprotective of her new friend with terrifying results.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: OJ and Emerald Haywood are in a remote gulch in California as the owners of a farm that specializes in training horses for Hollywood projects when a mysterious phenomenon suddenly begins to take over their airspace. It doesn't take long for the residents of the lonely area to begin experiencing horrific disturbances, not only around them but also within them. As the threat continues to exercise control over the place, they make a chilling discovery.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: While on holiday, a young couple's car suddenly breaks down in an insular rural community, so they take refuge in a remote cabin awaiting repairs. Yet when a trio of masked strangers begins lurking outside the cabin, the couple quickly realizes that not all is as it seems in this town.

programme.title: Halloween Ends
programme.desc: Laurie Strode embarks on her ultimate battle against infamous killer Michael Myers. Four years after Myers' last sighting, a babysitter is accused of murdering a young boy and the city is shaken by violence and terror. Laurie fears Myers' return and she must confront his evil force to free herself of his decades-long ghost. The final installment to the horror franchise.

programme.title: Clawfoot
programme.desc: This drama-thriller follows Janet, an upper-class housewife whose husband suddenly leaves without a trace. After his disappearance, a handsome contractor appears at their suburban home to remodel their bathroom. Since the contract bears her husband's signature, Janet lets him in, not knowing the psychological games he'll play with her until the tables are curiously turned.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin, a young girl and her two fathers are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand that the family make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. With limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.
