Laurie fears Myers' return and she must confront his evil force to free herself of his decades-long ghost. The final installment to the horror franchise.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Yuks and yucks collide in this uproarious British comedy, a seamless blend of wit and horror. Simon Pegg stars as a beer-swilling slacker who tries to get his miserable life in order while repelling the zombies that have overrun London. Pegg also co-wrote the script with director Edgar Wright. Kate Ashfield, Nick Frost, Lucy Davis, Bill Nighy, Martin Freeman.

programme.title: The Blackening
programme.desc: A group of Black friends, all horror movie enthusiasts, take some time off to spend their vacation in the woods. In the cabin they occupy, an unknown killer starts to threaten them. The group is then ordered to rate each other's degree of blackness to determine the order of who will be killed first.

programme.title: Sweetpea
programme.desc: High on power and righteousness, Rhiannon goes after her next target: the ultimate bully, Julia Blenkingsopp.

programme.title: 100 Streets
programme.desc: In this mesmerizing ensemble drama, the stories of a teenager dealing drugs, a cabdriver waiting to adopt a daughter with his wife and a drug-addicted former soccer star trying to patch things up with an ex all intersect in London.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: Contending with misdemeanor charges, disgraced minor league basketball coach Marcus receives orders from the court to take a team of players with intellectual disabilities under his wing. Longing for the skills of his former team, Marcus initially struggles to connect with his new team, given the variety of challenges their diagnoses present. Yet the athletes' continued perseverance against the odds inspires Marcus to change his ways, in turn helping the team reach new heights.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: After Lieutenant Artemis and her team of elite soldiers go through a portal and get transported to a different dimension, they are faced with a threat they have never encountered before: huge, powerful monsters. In the middle of the chaos, however, they meet The Hunter, a mysterious warrior whose impressive skills have allowed him to last in the new, hostile land. Together, they team up to secure their survival and find a way home.

programme.title: The Plus One
programme.desc: When Lizzie's doting father offers her the perfect destination wedding, she's deliriously happy. That is, until her "Man of Honor," Marshall, decides that his "plus one" should be his ex, Marie. Now, she has to face this unexpected disruption to her perfectly planned day. It will take the best efforts of her fiancé, Luke, and both their families to keep Lizzie focused on the wedding and from losing her mind as she tries to deal with this ex from hell.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: The Perfects—Michael, Denise, and their children Devin and Michelle—are planning their "Perfect" Christmas. But it is shaping up to be anything but perfect. Between unexpected mishaps, well-meaning friends, seasonal pranks, and even some criminal activity, it looks like the only thing perfect about this Christmas is the family name.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: Contending with misdemeanor charges, disgraced minor league basketball coach Marcus receives orders from the court to take a team of players with intellectual disabilities under his wing. Longing for the skills of his former team, Marcus initially struggles to connect with his new team, given the variety of challenges their diagnoses present. Yet the athletes' continued perseverance against the odds inspires Marcus to change his ways, in turn helping the team reach new heights.

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: In Georgia, an unlikely band of police officers, criminals, tourists, and teenagers find themselves thrust into a situation of life or death when an unnaturally large black bear suddenly rampages through the forest after consuming cocaine. The humans must then outlast the creature or face fatal consequences.

programme.title: Sweetpea
programme.desc: High on power and righteousness, Rhiannon goes after her next target: the ultimate bully, Julia Blenkingsopp.

programme.desc: Troubled by the ghostly activity taking place in their happy home, the parents of a newborn attempt to catch the supernatural entity on video. In addition, they recruit paranormal investigators to evict the spook.

programme.title: Saw X
programme.desc: The tenth installment of the Saw horror franchise tells an untold story of the infamous Jigsaw killer John Kramer. After receiving his cancer diagnosis, Kramer heads to Mexico for a new experimental procedure that could cure him. When he finds out it is only a scam targeting desperate cancer patients, Kramer becomes determined to track and torture the con artists responsible for the operation. He executes his genius and deadly traps to avenge himself.

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: This visceral shocker follows four ecology students who are faced with an impossible decision after a deadly parasite is unleashed and they must either run for their lives or sacrifice themselves for the sake of humanity. Val Kilmer, Martha MacIsaac, Aaron Ashmore, Kyle Schmid.

programme.title: Demonic
programme.desc: In this chilling horror film, a police detective and a psychologist probe a mass murder involving a group of amateur ghost hunters who were looking for supernatural activity in an abandoned house.

programme.title: Scary Movie V
programme.desc: Troubled by the ghostly activity taking place in their happy home, the parents of a newborn attempt to catch the supernatural entity on video. In addition, they recruit paranormal investigators to evict the spook.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A group of unemployed parapsychologists go into business as professional ghost neutralizers. But when New York City comes under attack from a host of supernatural demons, the self-proclaimed Ghostbusters must step up and save the world from the sinister 'Zuul.'

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: A river of slime is feeding on the "negative energy" of New York City and a tyrant in a 16th-century portrait wants to take over the body of a little child, the son of an art restorer working on the picture. It's a job for the paranormal Ghostbusters, who must reunite to contain the despot in this sequel to the crowd-pleasing 1984 comedy.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Three friends plot to end their money woes by burglarizing the home of a blind recluse. However, the heist quickly goes awry in this disturbing horror thriller when they discover that their target is concealing a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Don't Breathe 2
programme.desc: A blind veteran exacts vigilante justice on a group of intruders who abducts the 11-year-old orphan under his care and shatters the quiet existence he worked so hard to achieve. He turns to his inner resolve, military training, and the darkness within to save her.

programme.title: Model House
programme.desc: When a group of models stay at a secluded house after a photoshoot, they realize that they will be fighting for their lives. The house is taken over by intruders who have set out to terrorize the models, but these hostages will not go down without a fight.

programme.title: Tár
programme.desc: Considered one of the greatest musical icons of her time, Lydia Tár is a famous composer who leads a prestigious orchestra in Berlin. Making history as the first female conductor in Germany, she must live up to her name as she records her latest symphony.

programme.title: Making Babies
programme.desc: After trying and failing for years to get pregnant naturally, married couple John and Katie Kelly explore all the pricey, painful and pseudoscience ways to conceive. The various fertility treatments put a strain on their marriage, cause them to struggle with their identities and make them question whether they're meant to have kids.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe's short story "The Tomb of Ligeia," about a supernatural seductress (Sofya Skya) who must extract the souls of others to survive, and the respected academic (Wes Bentley) on whom she puts a curse to forever be her victim.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a firefighting team in Arizona known as the Granite Mountain Hotshots becomes one of the country's most elite units and is deployed against a massive conflagration in 2013 that threatens their town.

programme.title: John Q
programme.desc: Riveting thriller about a family man whose son needs a lifesaving heart-transplant operation. When his health-care plan doesn't cover the boy's medical procedure, he takes drastic steps to rectify the situation.

programme.title: The Silent Twins
programme.desc: The true-to-life story tells the tale of Caribbean immigrant twins June and Jennifer Gibbons and their life during the 1970s and 1980s. As a result of being bullied, they refused to communicate with others and only talked with each other. They create elaborate stories and fantasy worlds where they choose to live instead of the real one.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: A city-slicking radio talk show host from New York learns about the unsettling tale of a murdered young woman, a girl he once had a one-night stand with. Determined to learn the truth, he ventures to the American southwest in pursuit of clues that could yield the identity of her killer.

programme.title: Honk For Jesus. Save Your Soul
programme.desc: The narrative follows a Southern Baptist megachurch and its leaders who close down the church temporarily due to a scandal. Trinitie Childs is the beloved wife and renowned first lady of the church she runs with her husband, Pastor Lee-Curtis Childs. Despite this setback, the two try to rebuild what they have lost to regain their congregation's trust and loyalty once again.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Richard Brooks reprises his role as ADA-turned-defense attorney Paul Robinette, whose client is accused of murdering a Middle Eastern man, a crime investigated by Green and Cassady in conjunction with the FBI's Joint Terrorism Task Force. Det. Henry Paulsen: John Viscardi. Ben Faoud: Bernardo Peña.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Carl Mullaly (A.J. Handegard) turns up dead after a TV magazine show airs a story that portrays him as a sexual predator. Green and Cassady investigate the victim's neighbor, who is the father of an 8-year-old girl. Andrew Fleming: Remy Auberjonois. Hannah: Zoe Lister-Jones.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A CEO of a military body-armor company is shot dead as he arrives to his daughter's sweet 16 birthday party; the investigation leads Cassady and Green to believe the murder was committed by someone unhappy with the Iraq War. Dr. Elizabeth Olivet: Carolyn McCormick. Bill Whitney: Titus Welliver. Kenny Ellis: John Boyd. Alan Crockett: Brandon Scott.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Chevy Chase plays an unemployed television actor who lets loose with a drunken, bigoted rant during a DUI bust, at which time Green and Cassady discover evidence of another far more vicious crime. John: Jaymie Dornan.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A maker of sleazy videos exploiting young drunken women is investigated after one of his associates turns up dead. Chris Drake: Tim Peper. Bryce Moore: Daniel Cameron-Talbott. Nicole Flynn: Kim Shaw.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy calls for the death penalty in the case of a convicted mass murderer (Craig Walker) who escaped from jail and killed again.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A female escort is among the suspects brought in for questioning about the murder of an attorney connected with a high-profile wiretapping case. Samantha Weaver: Susan Misner. Julia Veloso: Mercedes Renard. Charles Dillon: David Arden Engel. Mike Owens: Chris McKinney. Dave Tindell: Timothy Adams.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A young man, who was homeless and addicted to drugs, dies under very strange circumstances while visiting his mother (Mariel Hemingway), a tabloid personality known for her alleged gold-digging ways. Dr. Adam Vaughn: Ben Bass. Tony Bicks: Dan Bakkedahl. Dave Seaver: Michael Boatman. M.E. Rodgers: Leslie Hendrix.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Secrets about an adopted child are uncovered in the course of an investigation into the shooting death of a soap-opera star's husband. Jennifer Beals, Anna Chlumsky.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A student is shot at a politically charged college assembly and the investigation leads to a Ph.D. student dealing in embryonic-stem-cell research who feels threatened by the tactics of the assembly speaker (Charlotte Ross)---a right-wing conservative. Bernie Adler: Ron Silver. Malcolm Yates: Louis Cancelmi.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: Seed pods from outer space drift to Earth where they duplicate---and replace---humans.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A young woman living in an old New York City apartment building becomes pregnant following a horrible nightmare, and begins to fear the worst for her unborn child while suspecting that she is surrounded by evil.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy teenager, dominated by a religiously fanatic mother, suffers at the hands of high-school bullies, whose mean pranks rile the teen into discovering she has telekinetic powers, which she uses to take ultimate revenge at the prom.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A popular reverend is suspected of a gay actor's murder when it is discovered the victim threatened to out the pastor and expose his hypocritical stance on homosexuality. Reverend Sterling: Anson Mount.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death by hanging of a successful actress and loving mother leaves the detectives searching for clues to prove it is a case of murder and not the suicide it appears to be.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A publisher is murdered shortly after putting out a controversial book, which may or may not be a factor in the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Arson is suspected in a series of church fires, but the case becomes a murder investigation when a victim is found in the charred ruins.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A female rapper is murdered and the suspect list is a long one, but the detectives are unsure if her death was connected to her music or just a random attack.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A Russian businessman dies after being poisoned, so the FBI thinks the case is an act of terrorism, but the detectives uncover a mystery involving the man's business that could send the investigation in a different direction.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a boy is found dead in a park, suspicion falls on a former sex offender in the neighborhood. But the case becomes confusing when the man provides information that points to another suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives look for a connection after two homeless men are beaten to death on the same day, and discover that one of the victims and a suspect had both served in Iraq.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An ex-senator (Harry Hamlin) is accused of murder, and his trial becomes a spectacle due in part to a publicity-hungry judge (Jeffrey Tambor) and an arrogant defense lawyer (Jeremy Sisto).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Det. Lupo's return is marred by his seriously ill brother's suicide by lethal injection. A second death with identical circumstances leads Lupo and Green to a parolee nicknamed "Dr. Death" and his daughter (Marin Ireland), who may be following in her father's footsteps.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives are called to an executive's home during a blackout and discover a murder and kidnapping. Fall Out Boy's lead singer Patrick Stump guest stars.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An explosion alerts Lupo and Green to a scientist's controversial research after one of the test subjects, a pregnant woman, is injured.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A lawsuit over missing pants becomes a murder case when the defense lawyer is killed. The investigation takes an unexpected turn when Detectives Green and Lupo uncover a connection to a large retail corporation that employs Van Buren's old friend and mentor, but the man's eagerness to help begins to cross the line and threaten the case.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Green investigate the murders of a white teen boy and a black girl in a delicate, racially charged case that soon envelops two brothers (Jeremy Allen White, Miles Chandler) and a local boy's father (Kevin Carroll).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The triple homicide of three roommates ostensibly appears to be a murder-suicide, the grim result of a lovers' quarrel. But after closer inspection, the case begins to swirl around a politically connected con man.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Evidence in a hit and run leads to a real-estate scam artist who has all but vanished. With the help of a title-agency employee (January Jones), the detectives go undercover in an attempt to lure the conman out of hiding. But the sting goes bad, prompting the department to shift its focus to a surprising suspect.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee believes Opie's frequent visits to the sheriff's office are negatively affecting him, so she forbids him to visit Andy at work. Bee: Frances Bavier. Barney: Don Knotts. Otis: Hal Smith.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.desc: When Sheldon has to spend a few days in the hospital, he turns into the world's worst patient. Also, Missy gets a taste of what life would be like without her twin.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Nuclear Reactor And a Boy Called Lovey
programme.desc: Sheldon attempts to build a nuclear reactor. Also, a university cocktail party gets heated when Dr. Sturgis' colleague, Dr. Linkletter, flirts with Meemaw, and Georgie is heartbroken when he learns Veronica has a boyfriend

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: David, Goliath and A Yoo-Hoo From the Back
programme.desc: Sheldon uses his new friendship with the school bully to boss Georgie around. Also, Missy steals Meemaw's makeup for picture day.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Math Emergency and Perky Palms
programme.desc: Sheldon and Dr. Sturgis have their first fight when Dr. Sturgis marks a question wrong on Sheldon's test. Also, Mary takes over for Pastor Jeff when he's out sick.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica's dream gown becomes the booty in a battle for the perfect wedding band; Joey and Ross date the same woman (Gabrielle Union) and end up in a war of their own over who has the best date planned. Megan: Andrea Bendewald. Woman: Kim Harris. Host: Matthew Mullany. Ross: David Schwimmer. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel teaches Joey the fine art of losing after he's nominated for an acting award; Monica fears marriage will end her love life; and Chandler drags Ross to an all-male meat market for the best tuna melt in New York. Presenter: Mackenzie Westmore. Jessica: Alison Sweeney. Jake: Troy Norton.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Ross and Monica's Cousin
programme.desc: A visiting Geller relative (Denise Richards) has the guys longing, as Rachel and Phoebe try to plan Monica's bridal shower on very short notice. Meanwhile, Joey's big film break comes down to a nude scene that showcases an asset he no longer has. Estelle: June Gable. Jake: Troy Norton. Fred: Fred Stoller. Chandler: Matthew Perry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachel's Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel's reunited with an old sorority sister (Winona Ryder) who has a hard time recalling their secret smooch back in college; Chandler has an even tougher time picking out a wedding tux after he learns that Ross has found one worn by Batman. Ross: David Schwimmer. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler's frantic race to figure out the perfect wedding vows leads to a series of nostalgic clips from episodes past, encapsulating their relationship. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Ross: David Schwimmer. Monica: Courteney Cox Arquette.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica drags Chandler to see his much mentioned, but never-before-seen, cross-dressing dad (Kathleen Turner) in his Vegas cabaret act; Ross rides shotgun for Rachel's less-than-joyful joyride in Monica's Porsche; Joey discovers the pleasure of wearing women's underwear. Jake: Troy Norton. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. On the eve of Chandler and Monica's big day, the groom vanishes and the girls discover a shocking secret about the bride-to-be. Meanwhile, Joey fears he may not make the ceremony after getting stuck while filming a movie with a famous, slightly drunk actor (Gary Oldman). Helena: Kathleen Turner. Nora: Morgan Fairchild. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
programme.desc: Conclusion. Chandler learns of Monica's big news before she walks down the aisle, while Joey's intoxicated costar keeps him from getting to the church on time. Richard Crosby: Gary Oldman. Helena: Kathleen Turner. Nora: Morgan Fairchild. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel reveals a bit of baby news at Monica's reception, while Chandler tries---and fails---to dance in rented shoes. Also, Ross gets stuck at the kids table after trying to impress his sister's sexy co-worker (Bonnie Somerville); and Joey uses his best-man speech as an audition for a director on the guest list. Dennis: Jim Piddock. Nora: Morgan Fairchild. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Red Sweater
programme.desc: Phoebe arranges a meeting between Rachel and the possible father of her baby after finding a clue to the daddy's identity; Joey has a proposal for whichever friend of his is pregnant; and Chandler finds that replacing a few missing wedding photos is a snap if you crash someone else's reception. Tag: Eddie Cahill. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: As Rachel sets off to tell her baby's father that he's going to be a daddy, the new Bings hit a dead end trying to get to their honeymoon. Treeger: Mike Hagerty. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Ross: David Schwimmer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The truth about Rachel and Ross's fateful one-night stand comes out after one of them admits they have the whole thing on video. But when the gang steals a peek, they all realize that a third party played a big hand in helping them get together. Kristin: Lisa Thornhill. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The new Mrs. Wolowitz wants her husband to move out of old Mrs. Wolowitz's house, while Amy and Wil Wheaton (as himself) get into a dispute, and Sheldon gets caught smack dab in the middle.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Raj try to discover where Sheldon disappears to every afternoon at 2:45. Meanwhile, jealousy appears to have insinuated itself into Leonard and Penny's relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon gets all revved up when the university reassigns his parking space to returning space traveler Wolowitz, and the resulting battle affects the entire gang.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy takes ill and Sheldon becomes her nursemaid, while Wolowitz takes a fishing trip in order to bond with his father-in-law.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A game of Dungeons & Dragons triggers Sheldon's memories of Christmases past, while Penny, Bernadette and Amy play matchmaker for Raj.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon earns a date with the Employee Relations Department when he gets accused of sexual harassment, and it looks like Leonard, Raj and Howard may go down with him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys' road trip to a comic-book convention in Bakersfield, Cal., gets sidetracked when Leonard's car is stolen.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is outraged, and his confidence takes a hit, when he's forced to work with his nemesis, Barry Kripke. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj shell out big bucks for action figures of themselves.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock thriller about a psychotic motel owner who obsesses over his late, controlling mother while becoming the prime suspect in a murder case involving one of his recent guests—a pretty secretary who checked into the Bates Motel after impulsively stealing $40,000 and never checked out.

programme.title: Peeping Tom
programme.desc: Michael Powell's notorious cult film about a voyeuristic filmmaker obsessed with capturing death on film.

programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: Spawned from the weird and wonderful mind of David Lynch, this surreal cult hit stars Kyle MacLachlan as a denizen of an All-American lumber town who discovers its dark underside when he's lured into an erotic murder mystery involving a sexy singer (Isabella Rossellini) and a drug-addicted sadist (Dennis Hopper).

programme.title: The Strangler
programme.desc: In a Boston hospital, a lab technician with a mother fixation has a propensity for strangling young nurses.

programme.title: Night Must Fall
programme.desc: A psychopath charms the young daughter of his elderly employer.

programme.title: Return to Glennascaul
programme.desc: While driving through the Irish countryside, a man picks up a hitchhiker who tells him of a strange event.

programme.title: Doctor X
programme.desc: A newspaperman investigates a wave of full-moon murders that have a cannibalistic bite to them.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Wax Museum
programme.desc: Chiller about a maniac who uses wax-coated bodies for his displays. Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray, Glenda Farrell, Frank McHugh. Ralph: Allen Vincent. Harold: Gavin Gordon. Dr. Rasmussen: Holmes Herbert. Joe: Edwin Maxwell. Sparrow: Arthur Edmund Carewe. Michael Curtiz directed.

programme.title: Thirteen Women
programme.desc: Tale of a maniacal beauty (Myrna Loy) determined to kill her old schoolmates via hypnosis. Grace: Florence Eldridge. Jo: Jill Esmond. Laura: Irene Dunne. Clive: Ricardo Cortez. Helen: Kay Johnson. Yogadachi: C. Henry Gordon. Hazel: Peg Entwhistle. June: Mary Duncan. Martha: Marjorie Gateson. May: Harriet Hagman. Mary: Julie Haydon. George Archainbaud directed.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: Tod Browning's cult classic about the relationship between a circus "little person" and the beautiful trapeze artist who marries him for his inheritance, but runs afoul of his fellow sideshow colleagues and their code of honor. Genuine circus and carnival performers were cast as the "freaks."

programme.title: The Bat
programme.desc: The remote mansion owned by a mystery novelist holds many secrets within the foreboding grounds, and the guests are all at the mercy of a crazed menace.

programme.title: The Wolf Man
programme.desc: Larry leaves America for Wales after his brother dies and tries to reconnect with his father. He meets a woman and they are both attacked by a creature, and Larry is informed that due to being bitten by the creature, he will become one, next full moon.

programme.title: The Black Cat
programme.desc: A blend of comedy and horror in a story of a wealthy recluse's murder. Basil Rathbone, Broderick Crawford, Hugh Herbert, Gale Sondergaard, Gladys Cooper. Elaine: Anne Gwynne. Henrietta: Cecilia Loftus. Richard: Alan Ladd. Eduardo: Bela Lugosi. Directed by Albert S. Rogell.

programme.title: Dracula
programme.desc: Bela Lugosi sinks his fangs into the role that made him a star in the original 1931 version of the vampire classic. Director Tod Browning's Gothic rendition of Bram Stoker's tale follows the bloodsucking count to England as he seeks a new bride and ensnares innocent victims in his diabolical schemes. Helen Chandler, David Manners, Dwight Frye.

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: One of the greatest horror films ever produced, this take on Mary Shelley's gothic tale centers on a scientist who assembles corpses to create a monster, who later incurs the wrath of the local villagers when he impulsively kills a little girl. Subsequently seeking out his creator, the creature flees with him to a nearby windmill.

programme.title: Bride of Frankenstein
programme.desc: In the masterful sequel to the 1931 classic, the mad scientist is persuaded by a creepy doctor to create a mate for his creature to help fabricate a new race, but all doesn't go as planned. Elsa Lanchester has dual roles as novelist Mary Shelley and the frightful fright-wig-wearing bride.

programme.title: The Other
programme.desc: Thomas Tryon's bestseller about a rural community shaken by tragedies in 1935. Uta Hagen. Niles: Chris Udvarnoky. Holland: Martin Udvarnoky. Alexandra: Diana Muldaur. Aunt Vee: Norma Connolly. Angelini: Victor French. Winnie: Loretta Leversee. Directed by Robert Mulligan. Robert Mulligan directed.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: A misfit youth trains rats to follow his bidding. Soon he uses the rats to seek retribution against those who hurt him. Based on the novel "Ratman's Notebooks" by Stephen Gilbert.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: After a man is killed by a zombie, his sister runs into an isolated house, where a group of people are holed up trying to figure out their escape from the flesh eaters.

programme.title: The Devil's Own
programme.desc: Joan Fontaine as a headmistress who, haunted by horrifying occult experiences in Africa, moves to a small English village, where she discovers supernatural terrors abound and one of her students is being sought as a voodoo sacrifice.

programme.title: The Devil Rides Out
programme.desc: A French nobleman, concerned about the bizarre behavior of a friend, soon discovers the man is being terrorized by a satanic cult and that only human sacrifice can save him.

programme.title: Eye of the Devil
programme.desc: A London-based vintner returns to his estate when a dry season threatens his crops, but his family notices disturbing behaviors by him and the townspeople that are reminiscent of past pagan rituals.

programme.title: About Face
programme.desc: Two Army sergeants cause chaos at a bar, crash a lively party, and stir things up at an Army-Navy dance. Their antics lead to unexpected adventures.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A mad scientist abducts a maiden in order to conduct his bizarre experiments.

programme.title: Isle of Fury
programme.desc: Humphrey Bogart as a killer hiding out in the South Seas and getting into a romantic triangle. Lucille: Margaret Lindsay. Blake: Donald Woods. Hardy: E.E. Clive. Anderson: Gordon Hart. Deever: Paul Graetz. Sam: Sidney Bracy. Otar: George Regas. Good cast in a lesser Somerset Maugham tale. Directed by Frank McDonald.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: W. Somerset Maugham's tale of Sadie Thompson, a South Seas floozy who falls prey to a hell-and-brimstone reformer wishing to save the soul of the "lost woman," while being romanced by a lovelorn U.S. soldier.

programme.title: Our Betters
programme.desc: Somerset Maugham's play satirizing immorality among Britain's upper classes.

programme.title: The Letter
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is an adaptation of the W. Somerset Maugham play about the wife of a rubber-plantation owner in Malaysia who commits a crime of passion, then claims self-defense, but a blackmailer appears with an incriminating piece of evidence. Oscar nominations also went to Bette Davis as the wife and director William Wyler.

programme.title: Strictly Unconventional
programme.desc: A woman (Alison Skipworth) who deserted her family tries to keep a girl (Catherine Dale Owen) from making the same mistake. Ted: Paul Cavanagh. Arnold: Tyrrell Davis. Clive: Lewis Stone. Lord Porteous: Ernest Torrence. From a play by W. Somerset Maugham. David Burton directed.

programme.title: The Painted Veil
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a doctor immersed in his medical research has an affair with a British diplomat; but she chooses to go with her husband when he must travel to the interior of cholera-ridden China.

programme.title: Of Human Bondage
programme.desc: Story of a disabled and introverted medical student's relationship with a crass waitress. Based on the novel of W. Somerset Maugham.

programme.title: Los 50
programme.desc: Un reto de Arena revela la falsedad y la deslealtad entre amigos. Sebas y Barquín arman un plan calculado para acabar con sus rivales, en un día marcado por una triple eliminación.

programme.title: Sed de Venganza
programme.desc: Eugenio Beltrán, un rencoroso hombre de negocios, usa a Paulina Ríos, su mejor carta, para llevar a cabo su venganza contra los Del Pino sin contar que esta bella mujer encontrará el amor con Francisco Ramírez, una figura del pasado quien le destruyó la vida imprudentemente. Paulina Ríos estaba determinada a escapar de los abusos que experimentó desde la infancia, pero sus planes se tuercen tan pronto como el engaño y el chantaje dominan su vida.

programme.title: La Familia
programme.desc: En plena celebración, Hulya se entera de lo que considera una afrenta a la familia, pide una explicación. A pesar de sus dudas, Aslan complace a su madre e invita a Cihan y a su tío a la boda.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him.

programme.title: The Faculty

Wu: Keone Young. Shadow Man: Pruitt Taylor Vince. Catherine Tarr: Dina Merrill. William Tarr: Dean Goodman.

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: A frightening confluence of "Alien," "Jaws" and "The Deep" follows a first-rate team of divers and their ghastly encounters with the ferocious creatures who inhabit the watery caverns under a 13th-century church in Romania. Cole Hauser stars as the head diver, with Eddie Cibrian as his brother and Morris Chestnut, Rick Ravanello, Kieran Darcy-Smith and Piper Perabo rounding out the squad. Marcel Iures, Lena Headey. Directed by Bruce Hunt and featuring excellent underwater footage by Wes Skiles.

programme.title: B. A.
programme.desc: A gang initiation goes wrong when a group of four recruits break into a house of horror. Win and you live - lose and you die. Sheaun McKinney, Tunde Laleye.

programme.desc: In order to save their city, a group of unlikely heroes band together to thwart a twisted serial killer who has been wreaking havoc in their city. Leading the investigation is a seasoned detective with an unlikely partner in the form of a new paramedic. As they trace and track the killer, they soon realize that they need to tap into their own pasts, where the key to stopping future killings lies.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: This gripping thriller takes a stroll down the psycho-path to discover what's eating the young Hannibal Lecter, and how the good doctor developed his appetite for eating his fellow man. Gaspard Ulliel more than ably fills Anthony Hopkins' shoes as the madman who would be Hannibal "The Cannibal." Gong Li, Dominic West, Rhys Ifans, Aaron Thomas, Kevin McKidd, Richard Brake, Helena Lia Tachovska. Directed by Peter Webber and written by Thomas Harris, who adapted his own novel.

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this chilling remake of the 2002 horror film of the same name, a group of friends head to a remote cabin in the woods for a vacation. However, their fun is soon interrupted by a flesh-eating virus that claims them one-by-one.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: Six adventurers arrive on an ancient shore seeking refuge. Soon, their dreams dissolve into dread when they encounter a malevolent force. Amidst fracturing bonds, a courageous young woman confronts the unsettling truth that survival demands unspeakable choices against an enigmatic and menacing adversary, forcing them to navigate the darkest corners of their humanity to endure.

programme.title: Ghost

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: A private detective in 1940's Los Angeles is hired to expose an adulterer, but soon finds himself caught up in a dangerous web of corruption that goes all the way to the top.

programme.desc: Barbra Streisand (who also directed) portrays a Manhattan psychiatrist who gets involved with her patient's brother and tries to exorcise the demons of their dysfunctional Southern family. An adaptation of the novel by Pat Conroy (who co-adapted with Becky Johnston).

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: This wildly ambitious and deeply moving epic comprises six tales from various historical eras. programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The 1999 case of a 24-year-old woman who was the co-CEO of a start-up Internet company who was found dead in a rowing scull on a city river. Lilly reopens the case when a threatening letter addressed to the woman turns up on a computer that was donated to a school. The investigation reveals that the woman's company was losing millions and that she wasn't well liked by her employees. Meanwhile, Valens believes a man who threw a woman into a river from a bridge may have killed Elisa as well.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The 1973 murder of a Vietnam prisoner of war who was slain seven months after he returned home is reopened after a box of POW bracelets with the victim's name on them turns up in the cellar of a drug house. The investigation reveals that the soldier had difficulty adjusting to life back home and may have gotten into drugs. Stillman, who served in Vietnam, takes the case personally and becomes determined to find the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a fisherman finds evidence of a young girl's death washed up on a shore in New Jersey, Lilly re-opens the 1965 case of 4-year-old child who had a seemingly abusive mother.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Valens reopens the 2001 murder case of a deli owner who was slain in his place of business and robbed. The victim's coworker was convicted of the crimes, but the man's brother brings forth new evidence that points to his sibling's innocence. Meanwhile, Vera cares for an abandoned baby and the department gets a new detective, Kat Miller (Tracie Thoms).

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: In 1988, a young man is gunned down on a highway after his car is hit from behind and a woman riding with him is wounded. The case was thought to be a routine carjacking until the woman disappeared from the hospital where she was being treated. In 2006, the probe is reopened when the woman is spotted in Atlantic City and she's brought in for questioning. The investigation reveals that the woman and the married victim were having an affair and planned to run away with each other.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a note connected to a supposed suicide is found, the team re-opens the 1994 case of a high-school kid who fell from the roof of the school building after having served detention. In 1994 the death was deemed a suicide, but the newly-found note indicates that the victim might have been fearing for his life.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The 1968 death of an 18-year-old girl who apparently fell down a flight of stairs backstage at a debutante ball is investigated after her mother comes forward with new information. A local art dealer, who back in 1968 escorted the victim at the ball, is accused of killing his wife by pushing her down the steps. The mother believes it isn't a coincidence that both victims died in the same way. Lilly becomes convinced, too, but there isn't any evidence to prove it.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.desc: La familia Martínez, que vive en una vecindad, enfrenta una crisis económica mientras los niños estudian y crecen. Tras la muerte de la abuela, los hermanos Felipe, Gonzalo y Rosa Isela, y los padres de la familia, se enfrascan en una disputa que los lleva a no hablarse más.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat steps over the line. She suspects her boxing trainer of taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins goes undercover to root out a government worker withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU struggles to find a serial predator who uses a date rape drug that leaves no evidence behind. Rollins receives some good news.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.sub-title: The Things We Have to Lose
programme.desc: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the 11th-season opener, Off. Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a rape victim, then reluctantly assists Benson and Stabler in the search for a serial rapist after Executive ADA Sonya Paxton (Christine Lahti) links the crime to other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Scott Foley) wakes up next to a dead woman and has no memory of who she is or what happened. The investigation takes Benson and Stabler in a variety of directions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler realize they've misidentified a murder victim at a wedding when the presumed deceased is found alive. They then must find the killer and correctly identify the victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson continues looking after a young boy entrusted in her care while also searching for his unstable, drug-addicted mother. His mom's name then turns up during an investigation, which Cragen assigns to Fin and Munch in order to keep Benson away from the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Abby Sciuto (Pauley Perrette) joins the Los Angeles team to investigate a chief petty officer's murder that matches the pattern of a serial killer Abby is tracking.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When a Marine is killed by an exploding cell phone, the team investigates his former unit, which specializes in explosives, to see if its members are suspects or potential victims.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An environmentalist's body is found at an industrial laundry plant, and the investigation puts Benson and Stabler in danger. After more victims are uncovered, Benson unexpectedly reflects on her past while bonding with a victim's daughter (Maria Bello).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Marcia Gay Harden) is raped while working undercover, and she asks Benson to have her rape kit tested. She then quickly resumes her work to preserve her cover, and only reluctantly allows detectives to become involved in the case, which on the surface involves a protest of a mosque at Ground Zero but really is much bigger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler speaks at a Take Back the Night rally at his daughter's college campus, and the rally inspires a woman to accuse a fellow student of rape. Stabler and Benson then investigate the case, and ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) is assigned to prosecute it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson partners with a female detective (Shohreh Aghdashloo) to investigate a DA's murder, and evidence of crime-scene tampering is found. The case then leads Benson to seek help from an assistant U.S. attorney (Gloria Reuben).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A billionaire (Colm Feore) becomes a suspect in a sexual-abuse case involving a teenage girl, and his highly paid attorney (Robert Klein) is able to make the case veer off course.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young girl's body is found with a doll left as a totem, so police retrace her last steps, which included a lesson with her piano teacher (Elizabeth Mitchell). They then seek help from a psychologist (Jeremy Irons) who decodes the meaning of the totem.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family vengeance factors into a rape case in which both the cops and the suspect seek outside help: ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) returns to help police, while the accused man recruits his cousin, L.A. DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard), to defend him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the 12th-season finale, a rape-trial witness is murdered before she's able to testify, so Benson and Stabler look for links between her homicide and the rape case and uncover some surprising relationships.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the 13th-season opener, a hotel maid accuses an Italian diplomat of rape, but then doubt arises about her believability. Meanwhile, Atlanta detective Amanda Rollins (Kelli Giddish) joins the squad as Benson tries to cope with the aftermath of a chaotic shooting in the precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl won't reveal who got her pregnant, leading police to suspect she was raped. The suspects include the son of a noteworthy political couple (Kyle MacLachlan and Paige Turco), as well as the son of their housekeeper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A family man (T.R. Knight) is suspected of being a serial rapist in a string of assaults stretching across several states. Mounting evidence points to his guilt, but detectives research his past and begin to believe his pleas of innocence.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A reality-TV producer is accused of raping an actress, and his arrest leads to a hostage situation. Meanwhile, Benson's bond with ADA Haden intensifies.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Building security expert Will Sawyer is blamed when the tallest, most advanced building in the world, located in in Hong Kong, bursts into flames. On the run from the police, the former FBI agent and amputee must infiltrate the inferno to rescue his family trapped inside, clear his name and find out the truth behind the attack on the skyscraper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A family is shot in their home, and the initial motive explored by detectives doesn't pan out. As the investigation progresses, Rollins jeopardizes her job by sharing a shocking secret.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Police search for an underage prostitute who's disappeared and realize she fits a pattern of missing prostitutes who placed ads on the same Web site. The case adds conflict to Benson and Haden's new romance as their personal and professional lives blur.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson asks Bayard Ellis to defend her estranged half brother in a child-custody case, but unexpected complications arise. Elsewhere, an abandoned newborn is discovered by a homeless couple.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A closed rape case of Benson's is reopened because of its similarities to a new case, and the possibility of wrongful imprisonment surfaces. As Benson's work is questioned, tension develops between her, ADA Haden and Bayard Ellis.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An environmentalist's body is found at an industrial laundry plant, and the investigation puts Benson and Stabler in danger. After more victims are uncovered, Benson unexpectedly reflects on her past while bonding with a victim's daughter (Maria Bello).

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The squad members come together to support one of their own; Herrmann tries to figure out how to reopen Molly's after it gets shut down; and Severide digs deep into the arson investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson and Casey meet with Louie's biological father; Severide falls back into bad habits when his efforts to help Anna don't go as planned; Brett opens up to Dawson; and members of Firehouse 51 become competitive.

programme.title: Love After Lockup
programme.sub-title: Life After Lockup: Red Flags & White Dresses

programme.desc: Athena investigates a robbery at a gas station that takes an unexpected turn when the would-be victim turns the tables on her assailant. Meanwhile, Bobby and the 126 race to rescue a novice diver who panics while in a shark cage, and a house sitter terrified of spiders. Then, Eddie reaches his breaking point, Chimney returns to the 118 and Maddie shares some news with Buck, who realizes he has to come clean with Taylor.

The members of the 118 race into action when a women falls over her penthouse balcony. Meanwhile, Athena investigates when a bike rider is impaled on a stop sign, Eddie begins his therapy for his PTSD and survivor's guilt.

The members of the 118 race to the rescue of a social media influencer when she has an accident in a sauna, then to an emergency at a reality show wedding, and finally a tragedy when a mother and her daughter go hiking. Meanwhile, Maddie worries she has missed too many firsts with Jee-Yun, May questions Athena's career path, and Hen and Karen attempt to recapture the fun.

The 118 races to the rescue when the 9-1-1 Call Center goes up in flames. Then, Bobby risks his life to save a trapped May, and Claudette, Buck and Eddie work together to help an injured electrician, and Chimney and his brother team up as firefighters for the first time.

After a mysterious death, Hen and Chimney put their lives in danger when they suspect that someone is playing God to make themselves look like a hero. Meanwhile, Eddie visits Texas, where he attempts to reconcile with his father.
The members of the 118 race to rescue a cliffside wellness retreat guru after his followers turn on him.

A blimp's engine catches fire; Athena and the 118 must rescue victims both inside and outside a packed sports stadium; Bobby and Athena drop May on her first day of college and plan their honeymoon; and Maddie and Chimney go to couple's therapy.

The 118 race to the rescue when a structure collapse at a "happiness convention" traps people under rubble. While on FaceTime with her mom, Athena's father suffers a stroke and crashes through the wall of his house. Hen stretches herself too thin with test prep and her new responsibilities at the 118, while Maddie tries to help new recruit get his bearings at the call center.
